headline: Darden Restaurants, Inc. (DRI): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Darden Restaurants, Inc. on Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DRI. Darden Restaurants, Inc.’s share was trading at $202.00 as of August 8th. DRI’s trailing and forward P/E were 22.75 and 18.90 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
